Message:
I was tied by the knights
and dragged throughout town.

“If only that woman
never came to this town...”

I heard voices filled with
grudges and resentment
from all around me.

Don’t look at me like that.
I...

I wanted to scream,
but I desperately
held it in.
I’ll be executed at this rate...

Because this will
finally set me free.

I don’t need to see anything.
I don’t need to hear
anything anymore...
